00052 EZRADIO_ConfigRet_t ezradio_configuration_init(const uint8_t* pSetPropCmd)
00053 {
00054   /* EZRadio command buffer */
00055   uint8_t ezradioCmd[16u];
00056   ezradio_cmd_reply_t ezradioReply;
00057 
00058   uint8_t col;
00059   uint8_t response;
00060   uint8_t numOfBytes;
00061 
00062   /* While cycle as far as the pointer points to a command */
00063   while (*pSetPropCmd != 0x00)
00064   {
00065     /* Commands structure in the array:
00066      * --------------------------------
00067      * LEN | <LEN length of data>
00068      */
00069 
00070     numOfBytes = *pSetPropCmd++;
00071 
00072     if (numOfBytes > 16u)
00073     {
00074         /* Initial configuration of Si4x55 */
00075         if ( EZRADIO_CMD_ID_EZCONFIG_ARRAY_WRITE == *pSetPropCmd )
00076         {
00077             if (numOfBytes > 128u)
00078             {
00079                 /* Number of command bytes exceeds maximal allowable length */
00080                 return EZRADIO_CONFIG_COMMAND_ERROR;
00081             }
00082 
00083             /* Load array to the device */
00084             pSetPropCmd++;
00085             ezradio_write_ezconfig_array( numOfBytes - 1, (uint8_t*) pSetPropCmd);
00086 
00087             /* Point to the next command */
00088             pSetPropCmd += numOfBytes - 1;
00089 
00090             /* Continue command interpreter */
00091             continue;
00092 
00093         }
00094         else
00095         {
00096             /* Number of command bytes exceeds maximal allowable length */
00097             return EZRADIO_CONFIG_COMMAND_ERROR;
00098         }
00099     }
00100 
00101     for (col = 0u; col < numOfBytes; col++)
00102     {
00103       ezradioCmd[col] = *pSetPropCmd;
00104       pSetPropCmd++;
00105     }
00106 
00107     if (ezradio_comm_SendCmdGetResp(numOfBytes, ezradioCmd, 1, &response) != 0xFF)
00108     {
00109       /* Timeout occured */
00110       return EZRADIO_CONFIG_CTS_TIMEOUT;
00111     }
00112 
00113     /* Check response byte of EZCONFIG_CHECK command */
00114     if ( EZRADIO_CMD_ID_EZCONFIG_CHECK == ezradioCmd[0] )
00115     {
00116         if (EZRADIO_CMD_EZCONFIG_CHECK_REP_RESULT_RESULT_ENUM_BAD_CHECKSUM == ezradioReply.EZCONFIG_CHECK.RESULT)
00117         {
00118             return EZRADIO_CONFIG_COMMAND_ERROR;
00119         }
00120         else if (EZRADIO_CMD_EZCONFIG_CHECK_REP_RESULT_RESULT_ENUM_INVALID_STATE == ezradioReply.EZCONFIG_CHECK.RESULT)
00121         {
00122           return EZRADIO_CONFIG_COMMAND_ERROR;
00123         }
00124     }
00125 
00126     if (ezradio_hal_NirqLevel() == 0)
00127     {
00128       /* Get and clear all interrupts.  An error has occured... */
00129       ezradio_get_int_status(0, 0, 0, &ezradioReply);
00130       if (ezradioReply.GET_INT_STATUS.CHIP_PEND & EZRADIO_CMD_GET_CHIP_STATUS_REP_CHIP_PEND_CMD_ERROR_PEND_MASK)
00131       {
00132         return EZRADIO_CONFIG_COMMAND_ERROR;
00133       }
00134     }
00135   }
00136 
00137   return EZRADIO_CONFIG_SUCCESS;
00138 }
00139 
00140 
00147 void ezradio_write_ezconfig_array(uint8_t numBytes, uint8_t* pEzConfigArray)
00148 {
00149   ezradio_comm_WriteData(EZRADIO_CMD_ID_EZCONFIG_ARRAY_WRITE, 1, numBytes, pEzConfigArray);
00150 }
00151 
00158 void ezradio_ezconfig_check(uint16_t checksum, ezradio_cmd_reply_t *ezradioReply)
00159 {
00160     /* EZRadio command buffer */
00161     uint8_t ezradioCmd[3u];
00162 
00163     ezradioCmd[0] = EZRADIO_CMD_ID_EZCONFIG_CHECK;
00164     ezradioCmd[1] = (uint8_t) (checksum >> 8u);
00165     ezradioCmd[2] = (uint8_t) (checksum & 0x00FF);
00166 
00167     /* Do not check CTS after sending the ezconfig array */
00168     ezradio_comm_CtsWentHigh = true;
00169 
00170     ezradio_comm_SendCmdGetResp( EZRADIO_CMD_ARG_COUNT_EZCONFIG_CHECK,
00171                               ezradioCmd,
00172                               EZRADIO_CMD_REPLY_COUNT_EZCONFIG_CHECK,
00173                               ezradioCmd );
00174 
00175     ezradioReply->EZCONFIG_CHECK.RESULT = ezradioCmd[0];
00176 
00177 }

00192 void ezradio_get_adc_reading( uint8_t adc_en, uint8_t adc_cfg, ezradio_cmd_reply_t *ezradioReply)
00193 {
00194     /* EZRadio command buffer */
00195     uint8_t ezradioCmd[EZRADIO_CMD_REPLY_COUNT_GET_ADC_READING];
00196 
00197     ezradioCmd[0] = EZRADIO_CMD_ID_GET_ADC_READING;
00198     ezradioCmd[1] = adc_en;
00199     ezradioCmd[2] = adc_cfg;
00200 
00201     ezradio_comm_SendCmdGetResp( EZRADIO_CMD_ARG_COUNT_GET_ADC_READING,
00202                               ezradioCmd,
00203                               EZRADIO_CMD_REPLY_COUNT_GET_ADC_READING,
00204                               ezradioCmd );
00205 
00206     ezradioReply->GET_ADC_READING.GPIO_ADC         = ((uint16_t)ezradioCmd[0] << 8) & 0xFF00;
00207     ezradioReply->GET_ADC_READING.GPIO_ADC        |=  (uint16_t)ezradioCmd[1] & 0x00FF;
00208     ezradioReply->GET_ADC_READING.BATTERY_ADC      = ((uint16_t)ezradioCmd[2] << 8) & 0xFF00;
00209     ezradioReply->GET_ADC_READING.BATTERY_ADC     |=  (uint16_t)ezradioCmd[3] & 0x00FF;
00210 }
